title: [GAMEPLAY] Syndra's E'd spheres stop upon hitting Veigar's E
body:
Spheres pushed away by {{champion:134}} 's E (Scatter the Weak) are being stopped by {{champion:45}} 's E (Event Horizon). 

[Youtube video representing the issue.](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h5-hf9E56EE&feature=youtu.be)

This seems to be the case because of the newly added ability of Event Horizon to stop dashes. My guess is that since everything is, of course, coded as minions, Syndra's spheres count as dashing minions and Veigar's E stops any dashing unit. And that doesn't seem right, does it.

replies.body:
Make this a feature and have his cage stop projectiles.

Yes I know, I hate Yasuo's Wind Wall too, but damnit, give our Tiny Master of Evil SOMETHING.
That's pretty cool to be honest.
Assuming you're not crazy and it's actually happening as you describe... yeah, I'd believe thats a bug that should be addressed.

Honestly, I think that should stay.

Veigar needs all the help he can get.

The fact that Veigar is in a not-so-great spot doesn't mean he has to have a single, completely unintuitive advantage in a very specific match up. The tooltip reads: 
> Enemies who pass through the edge of the trap are stunned for a short duration, and have their current movement (including dashes) stopped.

Since when are Syndra's spheres considered enemies? It's not like they run at things and try to hurt them. I mean, come on. There's a myriad of other ways he can be buffed.

I play Syndra, I don't play Veigar.
I'm still ok with this, I think even though it's most likely unintended, it's actually really cool.
Well I mean the balls are dashing, so it makes sense that they would be stopped.
Not intended surely, but that's actually fucking hilarious.
Add some screenshot / video to support the evidence. It'll help reds to flag it out more quickly
probably the same thing with like {{champion:14}} E

Heh, enemy veigar would not be able to stop sion E.  However, it would be interesting to see if friendly veigar stopped sion E.

For those who don't know, sion E minion tosses go through braum walls, yasuo walls, etc, since the minion is ally to the enemy.  Yay.
That's pretty awesome for Veigar I guess, but just really funny either way.

Well yeah, they're coded as minions.
;)
